package.name: Sphere
package.shortDescription: Multitasking anywhere in the system. Based on the old tweak AppHeads.

descriptionlist.description: Sphere creates small "spheres" of previously open programs. The spheres move freely so as not to obscure the area of ​​the screen you want. The spheres open their corresponding program in a pop-up window that occupies 80% of the screen, which allows for polysemy work. Long press on the sphere opens the app in full screen mode..
